text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: Huh? What did you say, Nature?

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
...It's good to be enthusiastic, but let<n>me offer you a
warning. There are<n>some real monsters here that feed on<n>
that enthusiasm.

text_block_list.name: Kitasan and Satono
text_block_list.text: M-monsters?!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Th-there's no such thing... right?<n>You're saying that as a
metaphor...<n>right?

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Ahaha, sorry. Yeah—I'm talking about<n>the protagonists of
the academy.<n>You'll see Teio and McQueen aren't<n>the
only shining stars here.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Everyone here has dreams and the<n>raw skills to see them
through. It's a<n>hearty full-course feast of<n>protagonists,
each with their own<n>rivals!

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text: Dreams, skills... and rivals.

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
Wow, I'm all fired up now! Count me<n>in! I wanna learn more
about<n>everyone!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
All right, then today's your lucky day!<n>'Cause I'm gonna
teach you about<n>some of those so-called monsters!<n>Let's
go!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Nin-nin mode, activate. You two've<n>met Helios and Palmer,
right? They<n>hype up the crowd with their flashy<n>
breakaway styles!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Yep, that's all true, but... why all the<n>lurking in the shadows?
Why not just<n>go up and talk to them?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Reconnaissance is all about being a<n>ninja. With that, my little
fledglings—on<n>to the next mission! Nin-nin!

text_block_list.name: Kitasan and Satono
text_block_list.text: Yes, master! Nin-nin!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Those three are known as BNW, and<n>they're always
competing for first<n>place. I think there've even been<n>races
where they all finished in the top<n>three.

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
Wow, that's so cool! So hey, do you<n>think I could be called...
KSB?

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: That's the cool part?

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text:
Umm... Those two seem like they're<n>arguing about
something...

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Yep, business as usual! They haven'tdebuted just yet, but they reallydon't want to lose to each other.They're future hot tickets for sure!

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
Future hot tickets... Wow! Everyone is<n>so different! There
really might be<n>some formidable "monsters" here.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
The truth is, we've barely scratched<n>the surface... Buuut
it's already late,<n>so let's call it a wrap for today.

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text:
Tannhauser, you're so<n>knowledgeable. You've even
looked<n>into the racers who haven't debuted<n>yet...

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
This much is normal. Everyone<n>researches their opponents
before a<n>race, don't they?

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: You would be one to call that"normal."

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Aha! I found you, Sneakyhauser!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Sneakyhauser? ...Wait, do you mean<n>me?

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
Is something wrong, Turbo? Why do<n>you seem so worked
up?

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text:
I heard what you're gonna do,<n>Machitan! You're gonna run
in that,<n>uh... "XC vision" race, aren't you?!<n>With Bourbon
and Rice!

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text:
And you're gonna wear your<n>racewear! That's so unfair! I
wanna<n>run too! Don't leave me out!

text_block_list.name: Kitasan and Satono
text_block_list.text: Bourbon and Rice?

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
It turns out that Bourbon and Rice are<n>scheduled to race
tomorrow, so we<n>hurry over to the track to do some<n>
reconnaissance for our ninja master.

text_block_list.name: Kitasan and Satono
text_block_list.text: Whoooa!

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: Did you see that just now, Dia?

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text:
Yes, I definitely did, Kita. Those racers<n>are Rice Shower and
Mihono<n>Bourbon...

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text:
Their running is so powerful... They<n>might even be a match
for Teio and<n>McQueen.

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
They do seem pretty monster-like. Is<n>Tannhauser really
gonna go up<n>against them?

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: Wait, where is Tannhauser anyway?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Ah—Kita, Sato! Nice timing!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Check out this letter! It says, "I'm<n>cheering for you! Do your
best!"<n>Hehehe. ♪

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text: Is that from the little girl we met the<n>other day?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Yep, yep! It puts a smile on my face to<n>know someone out
there is pulling for<n>me! All right, I'm gonna give it my<n>
AAALL—ack!

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: Aah! A-are you okay?!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Haha, it's just a nosebleed. Imust've gotten too excited. Sniff,sniff... Okay, all good now!

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text:
Um... Rice and Bourbon are both really<n>fast. Are you feeling
okay about the<n>race?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Hmm, well... I've raced those two abunch of times already. And I can tellyou, they're good! Really good!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
There's no way I can beat them<n>through hard work alone.
Just gotta<n>hope for a miracle! May the gods give<n>me
strength, namu-namu!

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
Uhh, I'm not sure that's gonna<n>work... But hold on to that
spirit and do<n>your best!

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
Ahhh... She really said there's "no<n>way" she can win. Now
I'm getting all<n>worried... Will she be okay tomorrow?

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text:
I know what you mean. I'm a bit<n>worried too. But I think
despite what<n>she says, she's still determined not<n>to lose.

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text:
Anyway, let's go cheer her on<n>tomorrow! I get the feeling
it's going<n>to be a fantastic race.

text_block_list.name: Umamusume's Journal
text_block_list.text:
"Tomorrow's the big day. I'm feeling<n>pretty nervous... But
it's okay—I've<n>done all I can to prepare. I hope I<n>don't let
down the people supporting<n>me!"
